result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott not in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz in court for Kaitlyn V Spott.  Attorney Alexander James Geocaris in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in Court for plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record, Defense requested adjournment of proceedings. Court grants request.  Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 10, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.

Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defense requested adjournment to allow time in finding out if this case can be transfered to drug treatment court.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 11.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Victim Impact Statement.  Received and Filed.  nk
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz who needs to appear by zoom due to being unable to pass the Milwaukee County health protocol screening.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for Alex Geocaris for the State of Wisconsin.  Kaitlyn V Spott appeared by video means with Attorney.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 25.   All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge David Swanson, Branch 11, in Room 316 of the Safety Building.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in court with Attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz; both appear by video.  Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in custody.  Annie Louk appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 28.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with All Kohl's Department Store in Milwaukee Co.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.

Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Kaitlyn V Spott in custody.  Anthony White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kaitlyn V Spott appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Kaitlyn V Spott
Current: 6705 W Morgan, Milwaukee, WI 53220   (Effective: 04-22-2022)
Prior: 1820 West Wells Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
